captions.text: What up you failed abortions,
we are only one month away from the kickoff and will rush to present all of the World Cup groups to you.
Hold on to your butts cause here comes the group C squads.
Colombia
Group C is so shitty that the first seeded nation is Colombia.
Even though it´s supported by the official sponsor of the World Cup, coke,
the Colombian squad doesn´t have that much of a big dick to be the first squad,
even though Rincón and Asprilla have been retired for a long time.
Colombia is known for having a jumbled team, while their crime is organized.
In the Medellín cartel training center, there’s no forgiveness who scores against their own goal.
They arrive to the Cup in a FARC airplane with the drugs hidden in Valderrama´s hair.
Even though they’ve seen better days technically, the Colombian players are more than warriors, they´re guerrillas,
and the game plan is pretty clear – spread it and snort.
So let´s see the highlights of your favorite team, cocaine dealing Bolivian editor.
We have two singers, Shakira, miss Waka Waka, who gets cheated on by Ibrahinosevich, and the big Martinália.
Macnelly Torres, who looks like the Chilean Arturo Vidal, but without the sissy hair.
The forward Falcão is the huge hope for goals. The coach, Páblo Escobar.
Greece
Greece is the oldest squad of this Cup.
The country has a strategic position in the south of Europe and has existed long before Europe itself.
Greece is as old as Zeus, son of Cronus and Rhea, tha boss, the chief of Mount Olympus, father of Gods and men,
the god of heaven, of rainfall and thunder, known on earth as Paulo Baier.
Greece is the creek of democracy and Socrates, western philosophy, literature, Olympic Games and scenic arts,
of tragedy and comedy, but the main collaboration of this people to us is Greek barbecue,
costs only $2,50 and comes with juice and a loose cigarette.
There’s also the Greek kiss, it´s just like a peck in the lips, but down that other hole. Emerson Sheik aproves.
Greece even won a Euro cup being lucky, but doesn´t scare anyone since the Trojan horse.
The midfielder, who had Socrates, Plato, Epictetus and Aristotle, is now missing it´s thinking heads.
The highlight of Greece in the Cup are music stars, who pretend to be ladies men but actually hook up with boys:
the country singer Luan Santana and the emo rocker Lucas Fresno.
Ivory Coast
Ivory Coast is a western European Country that proclaimed its independence from France only in 1960.
Even though, they make the whole world speak their name in French, Côte D’Ivoire,
but here we are men and we don’t pucker our lips up.
They say the name of the country comes from the amount of elephants that used to inhabit the area.
Actually, it´s because of the size of the trunks of its players.
Ivory Coast lost by 3x1 to Brazil in the last Cup and was eliminated in the group phase.
This time will be worse, because the team is the same and older that Rogerio Ceni and Paulo Baier combined.
That´s why they´re so angry, looking like psycho killers in the pictures.
Let´s move to the highlights: Yaya Touré, black scarface, wrinkled and scarred.
Gervinho, American Rambo, staring down his next victim.
Romaric, who almost has a good-player name, but really has blood-shot eyes,
and uncle Didier, who used to be a killer, but now just plain sucks.
Japan
Japan is a country that’s on the other side of the world
where there’re more Japanese than all the tourists attractions combined.
If you dig a deep hole, you’ll end up in Japan.
Japan’s thousand year-old culture is very rich.
The legend says that centuries ago samurais warriors ate so much raw fish that their dicks turned into minnows.
The Japanese flag has a ball, pity they haven’t learned how to kick it.
The only decent thing to come out of Japan is all-you-can-eat sushi and sashimi.
During the Cup, the playas will be confined in concentration.
So don’t bother waking up early to eat guioza at the farmers market.
You’re only going to find the sugar cane juice shack.
#therewillbenoguioza
The highlights of the kamikaze squad are:
the goalkeeper Kawashima, who’s going to get scored on.
Yasumito Endo, better known as japanemo, the Japanese emo.
That midfielder from Manchester United who only fucks up.
And the best playa in the team, the surfer Honda, who styles his hair with sex wax and surfs tsunamis.
There´s more to come, except there ain’t.
Next Thursday as you already know its Uruguay, Costa Rica, England and Italy’s turn.
SUBSCRIBE

title: ÁLBUM DA COPA DO DESIMPEDIDOS - #03 GRUPO C
